name: The boy sorcerer - Lost memory
description:
Take a break from a busy day and relax in our matching cards game and discover Anant's memories.

Four game modes!

Match two: in this game mode you must match cards two at a time.



Match three: here you must match three cards at a time.



Story: analyze the story picture and all the objects that are inside, then memorize them and test your memory against false and trap cards.



Story order: you must watch and memorize a sequence of cards, you must select them in the exact order that you saw the first time.



Each floor has 3 difficulty modes that ranges from easy, medium and hard.

Unlock 4 unique skins that come with their own VFX and SFX changing the gameplay and the atmosphere completely.

Enjoy 120 unique levels!
